component.name: getListById
component.description: Retrieves a list for a given Marketo Id

component.name: getMultipleLeadsByListId
component.description: Retrieves multiple leads from a given list id

component.name: createAndUpdateLeads
component.description: Creates a new lead or Updates an existing lead

component.name: associateLead
component.description: Associates a lead with a cookie value

component.name: getLeadPartitions
component.description: Returns a list of lead partitions in a Marketo instance.
